### Categorical Results 

``` {r results = "asis", echo = F}

for(i in categorical){
  lab = dict2[dict2$variable == i,]$variable_label
  if(is_empty(lab)){
    k <- print.cat(get({{i}}))} else {
      k <- print.cat(get({{i}}))
    }
  
  j = if(is_empty(lab)){paste(i)} else{lab}
        print(k %>% 
              kbl(caption = paste0("Results for: ", j)) %>%
              kable_styling())
  
}

```
